column4: Reuters hosts Newsmakers with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella and RBC President and CEO David McKay
column5: This week  Reuters hosted two Newsmaker events  featuring Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella and RBC President and CEO David McKay.

column4: Tesla's big battery races to keep South Australia's lights on
column5: HORNSDALE  Australia One year after the state of South Australia suffered a major blackout  the clock has started ticking for Tesla Inc to finish building the world's biggest battery to help keep the lights on in Australia's most wind-dependent state.
